# Overview {-}

This is the handbook for `MATPMDA`.  Details of the course structure,
including assessment and timetables, may be found online.  The whole
course is based around R and RStudio which may be downloaded from

[https://cran.r-project.org/]

and

[https://www.rstudio.com/]


This manual is distributed under the GNU GPL and is available at

[https://github.com/RobinHankin/matpmda](https://github.com/RobinHankin/matpmda

Please feel free to send corrections, bug reports, fanmail, etc to the
issues page:

[https://github.com/RobinHankin/matpmda/issues](https://github.com/RobinHankin/matpmda/issues)
